member.name: T:Sres.Net.EEIP.GeneralStatusCodes
member.summary: Table B-1.1 CIP General Status Codes

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.CIPException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.CIPException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.CIPException.#ctor(System.String,Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.TargetUDPPort
member.summary: UDP-Port of the IO-Adapter - Standard is 0xAF12

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.OriginatorUDPPort
member.summary: UDP-Port of the Scanner - Standard is 0xAF12

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RequestedPacketRate_O_T
member.summary: Requested Packet Rate (RPI) in Microseconds Originator -> Target for Implicit-Messaging (Default 0x7A120 -> 500ms)
member.value: The requested packet rate o t.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RequestedPacketRate_T_O
member.summary: Requested Packet Rate (RPI) in Microseconds Target -> Originator for Implicit-Messaging (Default 0x7A120 -> 500ms)
member.value: The requested packet rate t o.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_OwnerRedundant
member.summary: "1" Indicates that multiple connections are allowed Originator -> Target for Implicit-Messaging (Default: TRUE)
member.value: true if [o t owner redundant]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_OwnerRedundant
member.summary: "1" Indicates that multiple connections are allowed Target -> Originator for Implicit-Messaging (Default: TRUE)
member.value: true if [t o owner redundant]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_VariableLength
member.summary: With a fixed size connection, the amount of data shall be the size of specified in the "Connection Size" Parameter. With a variable size, the amount of data could be up to the size specified in the "Connection Size" Parameter Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: True (Variable length))
member.value: true if [o t variable length]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_VariableLength
member.summary: With a fixed size connection, the amount of data shall be the size of specified in the "Connection Size" Parameter. With a variable size, the amount of data could be up to the size specified in the "Connection Size" Parameter Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: True (Variable length))
member.value: true if [t o variable length]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_Length
member.summary: The maximum size in bytes (only pure data without sequence count and 32-Bit Real Time Header (if present)) from Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: 505)
member.value: The length of the o t.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_Length
member.summary: The maximum size in bytes (only pure data woithout sequence count and 32-Bit Real Time Header (if present)) from Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: 505)
member.value: The length of the t o.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_ConnectionType
member.summary: Connection Type Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: ConnectionType.Point_to_Point)
member.value: The type of the o t connection.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_ConnectionType
member.summary: Connection Type Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: ConnectionType.Multicast)
member.value: The type of the t o connection.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_Priority
member.summary: Priority Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: Priority.Scheduled) Could be: Priority.Scheduled; Priority.High; Priority.Low; Priority.Urgent

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_Priority
member.summary: Priority Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: Priority.Scheduled) Could be: Priority.Scheduled; Priority.High; Priority.Low; Priority.Urgent

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_InstanceID
member.summary: Class Assembly (Consuming IO-Path - Outputs) Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: 0x64)

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_InstanceID
member.summary: Class Assembly (Producing IO-Path - Inputs) Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: 0x64)

member.name: F:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_IOData
member.summary: Provides Access to the Class 1 Real-Time IO-Data Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging

member.name: F:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_IOData
member.summary: Provides Access to the Class 1 Real-Time IO-Data Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.O_T_RealTimeFormat
member.summary: Used Real-Time Format Originator -> Target for Implicit Messaging (Default: RealTimeFormat.Header32Bit) Possible Values: RealTimeFormat.Header32Bit; RealTimeFormat.Heartbeat; RealTimeFormat.ZeroLength; RealTimeFormat.Modeless
member.value: The o t real time format.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.T_O_RealTimeFormat
member.summary: Used Real-Time Format Target -> Originator for Implicit Messaging (Default: RealTimeFormat.Modeless) Possible Values: RealTimeFormat.Header32Bit; RealTimeFormat.Heartbeat; RealTimeFormat.ZeroLength; RealTimeFormat.Modeless
member.value: The t o real time format.

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.AssemblyObjectClass
member.summary: AssemblyObject for the Configuration Path in case of Implicit Messaging (Standard: 0x04)

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.ConfigurationAssemblyInstanceID
member.summary: ConfigurationAssemblyInstanceID is the InstanceID of the configuration Instance in the Assembly Object Class (Standard: 0x01)

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.LastReceivedImplicitMessage
member.summary: Returns the Date and Time when the last Implicit Message has been received fŕom The Target Device Could be used to determine a Timeout

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RegisterSession(UInt32,UInt16)
member.summary: Sends a RegisterSession command to a target to initiate session
member.param: Port of the target device (default should be 0xAF12)

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.UnRegisterSession
member.summary: Sends a UnRegisterSession command to a target to terminate session

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.Detect_O_T_Length
member.summary: Detects the Length of the data Originator -> Target. The Method uses an Explicit Message to detect the length. The IP-Address, Port and the Instance ID has to be defined before

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.Detect_T_O_Length
member.summary: Detects the Length of the data Target -> Originator. The Method uses an Explicit Message to detect the length. The IP-Address, Port and the Instance ID has to be defined before

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RegisterSession(System.String,UInt16)
member.summary: Sends a RegisterSession command to a target to initiate session
member.param: Port of the target device (default should be 0xAF12)

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RegisterSession(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a RegisterSession command to a target to initiate session with the Standard or predefined Port (Standard: 0xAF12)

member.name: M:Sres.Net.EEIP.EEIPClient.RegisterSession
member.summary: Sends a RegisterSession command to a target to initiate session with the Standard or predefined Port and Predefined IPAddress (Standard-Port: 0xAF12)

member.param: Instance of Requested Attributes (0 for class Attributes)

member.name: T:Sres.Net.EEIP.ObjectLibrary.IdentityObject
member.remarks: This object provides identification of and general information about the device. The Identity Object shall be present in all CIP products. If autonomous components of a device exist, use multiple instances of the Identity Object.

member.summary: gets the Vendor ID / Read "Identity Object" Class Code 0x01 - Attribute ID 1

member.name: P:Sres.Net.EEIP.ObjectLibrary.IdentityObject.DeviceType
member.summary: gets the Device Type / Read "Identity Object" Class Code 0x01 - Attribute ID 2

member.summary: gets the Status / Read "Identity Object" Class Code 0x01 - Attribute ID 5

member.summary: gets the Serial number / Read "Identity Object" Class Code 0x01 - Attribute ID 6

member.summary: gets the State / Read "Identity Object" Class Code 0x01 - Attribute ID 8

member.summary: gets the Maximum of connections supported / Read "Message Router Object" Class Code 0x02 - Attribute ID 2
